scripts.patch: npm version patch -m 'CI/CD: Bump version to %s'
scripts.minor: npm version minor -m 'CI/CD: Bump version to %s'
scripts.major: npm version major -m 'CI/CD: Bump version to %s'
scripts.build: npm run build:clear && npm run build:ts && npm run build-static
scripts.dev: concurrently "node tools/watcher.js" "npm run build && npm run serve:only > /dev/null 2>&1"
